verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, lover of my soul Jesus, I will never let You go. You’ve taken me from the mirey clay. You set my feet upon the rock And now I know{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love You, I need You Though my world my fall I’ll never let You go My Savior, my closest friend I will worship You Until the very end.{/lang-eng}
